name: Freedom Farms - White
description:
Get noticed in this classic Freedom Farms logo tee. This double-sided print shirt features our Freedom Farms logo in forest green on the front while "Fresh is Best, Taste the Difference" is boldly printed in matching color on the back.

This shirt is a 50/50 blend.

name: Original Tractor - Violet
description: Like the King brothers, many of you were born to farm. Show your appreciation for the art of plowing, tilling, picking, and planting with one of our original tractor design tees or hoodies.

name: Born to Farm - White
description:
The Farm Kings were born to farm, and we know that many families across the nation were raised with a shovel in one hand and a tractor wheel in the other, too. 

Embrace the farming lifestyle with this stylish "Born to Farm" tee. 

This shirt is a soft style junior fit ladies shirt with cap sleeves.

name: Cable Knit Beanie
description: This thick, warm, and comfortable beanie has a fleece lining and a cable knit construction. The logo is screen printed onto a cut-out of t-shirt material then sewn onto the hat to avoid that hard scratchy feeling of most printed beanies. The patch will fray upon washing giving it that vintage look.

name: Freedom Farms Two-Tone Hoodie
description: Make a statement with this contrasting color hoodie with our Freedom Farms logo. Featuring contrasting print ribbed waist and cuffs, and front pouch pocket. 9.5 ounce 80% cotton/20% polyester heathered fleece.

name: Fresh Is Best - Military Green
description: This striking design features the Freedom Farms logo along with our motto "Fresh is Best". The tone on tone printing makes for a bold statement where every you go. Printed on a super soft style tee, 4.5 ounce fabric, seamless collarette, taped neck and shoulders. Double needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem with a broader satin label.

name: Born 2 Farm Youth - Purple
description: Whether your on the farm or wish you were, our Born 2 Farm kids line lets the world know that your child was born to farm. Made of 100% heavy cotton, 5.3 ounce. 20/1 open end fabric, taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter turned body, and seamless double needle collar.

name: Taste The Difference - Bib
description:
Keep your little one clean while they are eating there locally grown veggies with our Taste the Difference bib. 
Constructed of 100% cotton terry with color matched binding, and a reinforced 2 snap closure.

name: Born 2 Farm Onsie - Blue
description:
Whether your on the farm or wish you were, our Born 2 Farm kids line lets the world know that your little one was born to farm. Made of 100% combed ringspun cotton ensures that only the softest material is next to your little ones skin.
Sewn with 100% cotton thread, reinforced 3 snap closure, and loose fitting neckline.
Available in white, pink, and blue

name: Born 2 Farm Onsie - Pink
description:
Whether your on the farm or wish you were, our Born 2 Farm kids line lets the world know that your little one was born to farm. Made of 100% combed ringspun cotton ensures that only the softest material is next to your little ones skin.
Sewn with 100% cotton thread, reinforced 3 snap closure, and loose fitting neckline.
Available in white, pink, and blue

description:

Sewn with 100% cotton thread, reinforced 3 snap closure, and loose fitting neckline.
Available in white, pink, and blue

description:
Like the King brothers, many of your children were born to farm. Show your appreciation for the art of plowing, tilling, picking, and planting with one of our original tractor designs. 
The double sided print features our original tractor design on the front with King Brothers Born to Farm on the back.

This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seamless double needle collar.

name: Farm to Fork - Green
description: We grow, and you eat! If you enjoy tasty, local foods as much as we do, the "Farm to Fork" tee is for you. Note: Dale is 5'9" and wearing an XL in green and a 2X in brown. Front: (Picture) We Grow, You Eat! Back: Freedom Farms, Born to Farm www.freedomfarmspa.com No exchanges or returns.

name: Farm to Fork - Brown
description: We grow, and you eat! If you enjoy tasty, local foods as much as we do, the "Farm to Fork" tee is for you. Note: Dale is 5'9" and wearing an XL in green and a 2X in brown. Front: (Picture) We Grow, You Eat! Back: Freedom Farms, Born to Farm www.freedomfarmspa.com No exchanges or returns.

name: Farm to Fork Long Sleeve - Green
description: Freedom Farms knows that the freshest, healthiest, and tastiest foods go straight from the farm to your fork. Keep warm and support the "eat local" movement with our "Farm to the Fork" long-sleeve tee. This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seamless double needle collar. Note: "Born to Farm" runs down left sleeve

name: Farm to Fork Long Sleeve - Black
description: Freedom Farms knows that the freshest, healthiest, and tastiest foods go straight from the farm to your fork. name: Know Your Roots - Indigo
description: This nation was born through sustainable agriculture, and the future depends on our continued support of the farmers who bring food from the fields to our forks. Show your appreciation with a "Know Your Roots" tee. This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seemless double needle collar. Note: Betsy is 5'7" and wearing a size Small. Front: Know Your Roots, Sustainable Agriculture is our Future Back: Freedom Farms: Home of the Farm Kings, Born To Farm No exchanges or returns.

name: Freedom Farms University Style - Military Green
description:
Let your children take a piece of the farm with them to college with the "Freedom Farms University Style" t-shirt. 

This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seemless double needle collar.

name: Queen of the Farm Kings - Vintage Blue
description: Are you the queen of your farm? Own your role with a super soft and comfy "Queen of the Farm Kings" tee.

name: Queen of the Farm Kings - Vintage Grey
description: Are you the queen of your farm? Own your role with a super soft and comfy "Queen of the Farm Kings" tee. Features: — Ladies' cut, v-neck. Note: Lisa (left) is wearing a Large, Betsy is wearing a Medium.

description:
Like the King brothers, many of you were born to farm. Show your appreciation for the art of plowing, tilling, picking, and planting with one of our original tractor design tees or hoodies. 

This is an 8.0 ounce heavy blend hooded pullover. double lined hood with matching drawstring. Set in sleeves, double-needle throughout with front pocket

name: Original Tractor Design
description: Like the King brothers, many of you were born to farm. Show your appreciation for the art of plowing, tilling, picking, and planting with one of our original tractor design tees or hoodies. name: Meet Your Meat - Chicken
description: Get to know your meat with our Meet Your Meat line of shirts. This 100% cotton 5.3 ounce shirt is printed on both the front and back. The front of the shirt features the Freedom Farms logo on the right chest, while the back showcases all the different cuts of Poultry.

name: Meet Your Meat - Pig
description: Get to know your meat with our Meet Your Meat line of shirts. This 100% cotton 5.3 ounce shirt is printed on both the front and back. The front of the shirt features the Freedom Farms logo on the right chest, while the back showcases all the different cuts of Pork.

name: Meet Your Meat-Cow
description: Get to know your meat with our Meet Your Meat line of shirts. This 100% cotton 5.3 ounce shirt is printed on both the front and back. The front of the shirt features the Freedom Farms logo on the right chest, while the back showcases all the different cuts of beef.

name: Freedom Farms 2014 Calendar
description:
It's here! 

Get yourself a copy of our brand new 2014 calendar, complete with lots of photos of all the Kings. 

Each month enjoy a photo collage highlighting every member of the family, along with the farm.

name: Recipes from Lisa's Kitchen - A Cookbook by Lisa King
description:
We are so happy to announce the release of “Recipes from Lisa’s Kitchen!”

This cookbook contains 43 recipes, including all of Lisa’s famous dishes:

* Tomato Basil Pie
* Chicken Salad
* Mushroom Meatballs
* Potato Salad
* Cabbage & Noodles
* Italian Wedding Soup
* Tomato Sauce
* Hot Pepper Mustard

…and much more!

Enjoy stories from Lisa, photos from the farm, and lots of tips. 


**IF YOU'RE LOCAL, COOKBOOKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE AT OUR FARM MARKET AND CAFE**

***NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES***

name: Freedom Farms Gift Card
description:
Available in $25, $50 or $100.

Only able to be used at our 3 retail locations. Not for use in our online store.

Gift cards can be used at:

Freedom Farms Home Market
Freedom Farms Cafe & Carry-Out
Boldy's Homemade Goodies

All open 7 days a week!

name: Farm Kings Hats
description: Shade the hot summer sun with a Farm Kings hat! Features: — Mesh camo back with adjustable velcro strap saying "Born to Farm" — "Buy Local" and "Eat Fresh" on inside seaming.

name: Livin' La Vida Locavore Ladies Tank
description: This tank is perfect for the gal who embraces the locavore lifestyle. Choose a ladies' burnout racer back tank top in purple or green. "Livin La Vida Locavore" "Hand Picked Produce From the Farm Kings" www.freedomfarmspa.com Note: Tanks run a bit small, so we recommend sizing up.

name: Farmer Definition
description:
You're proud of the grit and determination you put into your work, so show it with our "Farmer Definition" tee. 

Inspired by Pete's appearance on local TV station KDKA where he described a farmer as "a person outstanding in their field," this shirt makes the perfect gift for the hard-working farmer in your life.  

This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seamless double needle collar.

name: Freedom Farms Magazine - Farming Is King
description:
Freedom Farms Magazine brings the farm to the newsstand, giving the knowledge and insights that have made Freedom Farms a success to readers, whether they are career farmers themselves or stay-at-home moms tending a backyard garden.
 
Our readers are passionate about fresh, local food. Our recipes appeal to urban gourmet chefs as well as parents interested in providing their families with healthy food. And our features appeal to anyone passionate about sustainable living through features ranging from expert interviews to step-by-step project guides to arts & crafts for the family.

Subscribers will receive an issue every month from January 2014 - May 2014. Note, subscriptions are non-refundable.

*Magazine subscription cost DOES NOT APPLY towards the promotion of "Free Shipping over $100 or more".

name: Cafe & Carry-Out
description: At Freedom Farms, we know that fresh is best. Help us spread the word with a cafe & carry-out tee! Note: Amanda (pictured) is 5'3" and wearing a size Medium. No exchanges or returns.

name: Freedom Farms (corn in pocket)
description:
Freedom Farms' fresh produce never has to leave your front pocket with this stylish and comfy tee. 

This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seamless double needle collar. 

— 100% pre-shrunk cotton

name: I Love My Farmer
description: We love our farmers at Freedom Farms, and we bet you love the farmers in your life, too. Show your appreciation for their hard work with the "I Love My Farmer" tee. Note: Bitty is wearing a size medium.

name: You Can't Outsource
description: Support local growers and join the "eat local" movement with the "You Can't Outsource Local" tee. This shirt is 100% cotton 5.3 ounce tee in a 20/1 open end fabric. Taped neck and shoulders. Double stitched sleeve and bottom hems, quarter-turned body. Seamless double needle collar. Note: Blank back

name: Farming is King
description: At Freedom Farms and across the U.S., farming is king. Show your respect for the devoted farmer in your life with our "Farming is King" tee. Note: Nothing on back, no exchanges or returns.

name: Got Freedom Hoodie - Navy
description: Stay warm and cozy in the brisk fall and winter air with our "Got Freedom?" hoodie. Note: "Born to Farm" runs down left sleeve, available in military green or navy

name: Got Freedom Hoodie - Military Green
description: Stay warm and cozy in the brisk fall and winter air with our "Got Freedom?" hoodie. Note: "Born to Farm" runs down left sleeve, available in military green or navy
